author: lucysL2080FC
title: A bday trip to The City -
text: Staff is excellent! I've stayed here 5 times the last year, I have family that live just around the corner so it's convenient. I have come to the conclusion it totally depends on what room you get. Pent house and premier rooms are great, but after that it's a real crap shoot. The last one was the worst. Smoked cover curtains and smell, a piece of the crown molding was missing and there were at least 10 squished cockroaches where the crown should have been, room 1007, no remote for tv. Book premier if you can.
